channel.title: Progress on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Progress on FinanClub

item.title: MPW
item.description: score:-51 Chances: Medical Properties Trust is making progress on its plan to get back on solid ground. MPW delivered FFO and revenue surprises of 33.33% and 142.04%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2023. The healthcare REIT sub sector has emerged as the new leader among REITs.
